title: U.S. online shopping frequency 2014 to 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
Response Once or more per month has the highest Share of respondents and Never has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 28.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Once or more per month and lowest at Response Never.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
Response Once or more per month has the highest Share of respondents and Never has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 28.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Once or more per month and lowest at Response Never.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Response At least once a week.
There is a difference of 28.0 between the maximum Response Once or more per month and minimum Response Never.
Share of respondents at Response Once or more per month is 32.0 , second place is At least once a week at 29.0, and thirdly is 7-12 times per year at 13.0.
The lowest value 4.0 at Never is almost 1.92 times smaller than the average value 16.67.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 100.0.
